pkgmetadata.longdescription: # QuickLog - A simple logger for python## Installation### Direct via pip:```shellpip install pyquicklog```### Clone repository via git:```shellgit clone https://github.com/bbenouarets/quicklog.py.gitmv quicklog.py pyquicklog```**If you want to use this module for your project, you must copy this module to your project folder.**```shellcp pyquicklog $YOUR_PROJECT/modules/```
